captions.text:
The next game is "Improbable
Square", everybody plays.

Elidio and Gustavo, go to
the front of the square.

How does Improbable
Square works?

The two players at the
front will start a scene,
with a theme provided by you.
I ring the bell, the square turns.

The two players at the front will start
a new scene with the same theme.
The square turns.

The two players at the front will start
a third scene with the same theme.
The square turns.

The two players at the front will start
a fourth scene with the same theme.
The square turns.

When the players at
the front are repeated,

they have to resume the scene
they were doing in the first round.

I'd like some help, please.
You, in the corner, how are you?

- What's your name?
- Vitor.

I'd like some words starting
with Victor's 'V'.

- Virilha!
- 'Virilha', groin!
'Groin'. Good luck, Colombia!

'Groin' is the theme for
"Improbable Square", starting now!

- Good afternoon, sir.
- Good afternoon.
I'm a groin salesman!

Doctor, the pain went to the groin
and it's still there. Can you examine it?
Now I get it!

Here...
Sit down, please.
It's going down.

- Mister king...
- Yes!

- I bring news from your sisters.
- What happened to my sisters?

- They won't be able to come.
- But the invitations...

They said they were groin but
they are not groin anymore!

- Is this the first groin you live in?
- First one.
I was...
You can switch groins if you want.
This one is great for sundays!
Can I switch other people's groins?

You see, my master's
underwear are awful,

and I believe I could
solve this problem!
Let's do this thing you've said!

- Is my groin okay, doctor?
- Easy.
It's going down!

Your brother-in-law
isn't groin anymore.

But if nobody's groin, who will gro?
Which people will gro?

- I was in a foot once. Between
the toes. - In a foot? Oh, no.

- Why not? - They use that powder in
the foot and we dry up, it's awful.

But that's good to keep you in shape.
I was in an athlete's foot once.
It was amazing!
One, two, three, four, five,

six, seven, eight hundred.
All right. It looks great!

- Did you like it?
- I think it goes well with your... Jacket.

- Is it?
- I'm leaving!

- Okay.
- Lots of groins to sell!

That's great, now let's
take a look at your groin...
Now cough.

I'm here, your majesty,
we can start the banquet.

No. Before we proceed, I want
you to conjugate the verb 'to groin'.

- Present continuous, perfect...?
- Perfect.

I have groin, you have
groin, he has groin,

- we have groin, you have groin...
- You have groin?

You have groin.
They have groin.
What about the gerund?

- I guess I'll leave!
- Don't leave!

- I feel like an ass here.
- Nice to meet you, I'm Boil.

So, Gustavo, now you know
what a groin is, right?

Not really, because he did
this in the beginning...

So I thought it was
a kind of underwear...

Then he said 'doctor'
and I thought it was an organ...

Then there was the boil
and I freaked out...

Groin, Gustavo, is this place,
but in the leg. Got it?

- Oh, I see...
- It's the leg's armpit.

So that's why...
I was selling...

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

- Troca!
- Morre logo essa morte!
